Our heroes attempted to pitch their wild and wacky idea for an amusement park called Idiotland
Stupidville to some of the richest creatures in Gal Gadot, the largest majority orc city
in the Terrifier Kingdom, built from the bones of long dead Kaiju Manji.
Prior to going out and pitching to the orcs, the gang leveled up to level 3, among the
most important levels in 5th edition.
Dogen spit in the face of his dirt god, but no dirt came out, because he was mad that
Dogen tricked him all these years into chewing dirt to commune with him.
